activities.name: Cultural Heritage Club
activities.description: Created space for multicultural students to share traditions
activities.impact: Grew from 5 to 40 members, hosted 8 cultural celebrations

activities.name: Mental Health Awareness
activities.description: Spoke at assemblies about anxiety and depression
activities.impact: Reduced stigma, increased counseling center usage by 30%

core_values.description: Being true to all aspects of identity
Creating space for all identities to thrive

defining_moments.title: Coming Out Speech at Assembly
defining_moments.description: Sharing personal mental health story with entire school

defining_moments.title: Cultural Heritage Club Evolution
defining_moments.description: As Co-Founder of the Cultural Heritage Club, I transformed a small group into a thriving community of 40 members. Our cultural celebrations fostered understanding and acceptance, creating a vibrant space for multicultural students to share their traditions.

defining_moments.title: Mental Health Advocacy Journey
defining_moments.description: My journey as a mental health advocate began with speaking at school assemblies about anxiety and depression. These talks reduced stigma and increased counseling center usage by 30%, highlighting my dedication to social impact and community service.

defining_moments.title: Coming Out Speech Transformation
defining_moments.description: Sharing my personal mental health story during a school assembly was a vulnerable yet empowering moment. It taught me that embracing vulnerability can lead to authentic connections and inspire others to share their struggles.
